description: One of the series` main protagonists, she is first seen battling RUC`s special forces. She accidentaly meets Roy Revant, whom she gets attached too. After saving Roy`s life she ends upo staying in his house. Her cheerful, helpful and naive personality is the object of patronizing feeling of people surrounding Roy, and eventually Roy himself, who gives her the name Solty (which comes from one of the old records at Roy`s home). It is up to her acquaintances and friends to discover Solty`s real identity.
name: Solty Revant
